div.div:
feat(testing): Increase test coverage for http and download modules
- Increased test coverage for `civitai_manager_libs/http/client.py` to over 85%. - Increased test coverage for `civitai_manager_libs/download` to over 88%. - Refactored tests to correctly handle `AuthenticationError`. - Removed the `@with_error_handling` decorator from `get_stream` to allow exceptions to propagate.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

test: unify download utilities and expand test suite
- Consolidate download utilities imports under a single alias and split get_save_base_name tests into distinct primary-file and fallback scenarios. - Expand download_preview_image tests to cover empty data branches and a successful width-adjusted download path. - Restructure download_file_thread_async tests into focused cases for missing inputs, version info failure, folder creation failure, and a full-flow scenario with proper start/complete notifications and task scheduling. - Refactor file_downloader tests: rename DummyMixin to DummyDownloader, add an autouse fixture for download tracker patching, remove outdated tests, and concentrate on speed calculation and resume-download success and failure behavior. - Revise HTTP client tests by disabling real sleep, verify mapping of request exceptions to our error classes, test post_json for immediate success, HTTP-error retries, connection and JSON-decode failures, and assert internal retry logic decisions. - Add new HTTP client manager tests to ensure clients are reconfigured with updated settings at runtime and that get_http_client returns a true singleton.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

test: add comprehensive download and HTTP client tests
- Add tests for CivitaiHttpClient covering JSON GET/POST success and failure (HTTP errors, JSON decode errors), stream retrieval, and API key header updates. - Introduce ParallelImageDownloader tests for empty input, progress callback invocation, correct success count, and authentication error handling. - Cover FileDownloadMixin download and resume behavior, speed calculation, range header preparation, cleanup of zero‐byte files, and size validation with warning on mismatch. - Add tests for download task manager functions: auth handling, retry logic, file handling, notifications wrapper, and core download_file and download_file_gr utilities. - Validate filename utilities and preview image download logic, including duplicate file numbering, save base name fallback, preview image success/failure, and lora model type detection. - Ensure synchronous DownloadManager behavior and verify DownloadNotifier logs start, progress, and completion (success/failure) messages.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix: adjust DownloadNotifier to support dynamic get_notification_service patches for tests
Previously, DownloadNotifier imported get_notification_service statically, which prevented test patches from ui.notification_service or notifier module from taking effect. Rework notifier to proxy get_notification_service calls through a wrapper that dynamically delegates to ui.notification_service. This change allows both test_notifier and test_async_download test suites to correctly mock the notification service.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

test: boost test coverage for HTTP clients and downloads
- Add tests for client_manager to verify new HTTP client defaults, singleton behavior, and dynamic configuration updates - Cover download_task_manager functionalities including wrapper chains, download_file variants, image download edge cases, and DownloadManager start/cancel logic - Expand download utilities tests with scenarios for duplicate filenames numbering, base name resolution from version info, preview image handling, LoRA model detection, and asynchronous thread notifications - Overhaul file_downloader tests by introducing a DummyMixin, validating streaming download success, resume header preparation, resume positions, total size calculation, speed formatting, and robust error handling with retries and cleanup - Enhance HTTP client tests to assert response‐error handling, API key header updates, get_json/post_json success and failure paths, retry behavior, and redirect/stream/authentication error flows - Add ParallelImageDownloader tests for empty task lists, successful downloads, and authentication error notification - Simplify notifier tests to confirm start, progress, and completion notifications through a patched notification service
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

test: improve file download and HTTP client reliability
- Enhance get_save_base_name to accept primary as either a single dict or a list/tuple of dicts, safely extract the name, and use dict.get for fallback folder naming to avoid KeyErrors. - Update HTTP client’s _handle_connection_error to match custom exception signatures (remove direct url arg for TimeoutError/ConnectionError) and clarify with an inline comment. - Add comprehensive tests for download utilities, covering duplicate‐file numbering, base name extraction, preview image download logic, LoRA model detection, and shortcut creation for downloaded models. - Introduce full FileDownloadMixin test suite: header/resume handling, total size computation, resume position detection, download speed tracking, progress callbacks, cleanup on failure, size validation (with tolerance and warnings), and download‐error processing. - Revamp HTTP client tests: streamline DummyResponse, prevent real HTTP calls, verify API key header updates, enforce _handle_response_error raising, test connection‐error exception types, JSON POST retry behavior, retry-decision logic, and detailed stream-response validation for redirects and errors. - Add tests for DownloadNotifier to confirm info, warning, and error messages are shown correctly on start, progress, and completion.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

docs: update for modular HTTP and download refactor
- Updated http_client_guide.md to document new modular structure, usage patterns, and backward compatibility for HTTP and download modules - Updated architecture_overview.md to reflect new module layout, architectural benefits, and recent improvements - Added details on removed ChunkedDownloader, error handling, and performance enhancements
Resolves #70
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore: align coverage configs with new module names
- Rename coverage and pytest module references from http_client to http and from downloader to download in .coveragerc configurations.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix: resolve trailing whitespace and blank-line flake8 issues in download and http modules
- Removed trailing whitespace and ensured newline at EOF in download/__init__.py, notifier.py, task_manager.py and http/file_downloader.py, http/image_downloader.py, http/client_manager.py.\n- Added missing blank line after class in http/client_manager.py to satisfy E305.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix: resolve flake8 issues in download and http modules
- Removed unused 'threading', 'Callable', 'AuthenticationError', and 'config_manager' imports. - Added 'CompleteCivitaiHttpClient' to __all__ in http module to maintain backward compatibility and suppress unused import warning.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

test: update test module paths for download async and download_file_gr
Updated tests to patch correct module paths after refactoring download utilities. - Async download tests now patch civitai, util, DownloadNotifier and DownloadManager from download.utilities and download.task_manager. - download_file_gr test now patches get_http_client from download.task_manager.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>
Reviewed #71 refactor: Split http_client.py and downloader.py into SRP-focused submodules
Opened #70 refactor: Refactor and split `http_client.py`, `downloader.py` into submodules to achieve SRP.
